languages.text: "Культ Последнего восхода и рейдеры друкари соревнуются, кто доставит нам больше хлопот. Я мобилизовал для отпора все силы, которые мог, потому мы еще живы. Сводные эскадры ополчения охотятся на нелюдей и охраняют конвои, а экспедиционные корпуса с лояльных миров давят мятежи еретиков. Ситуация нестабильна, но... Не буду лгать, что не готовился к этому кризису. Мы еще не проиграли".

"The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."
languages.original_text: "Культ Последнего восхода и рейдеры друкари соревнуются, кто доставит нам больше хлопот. Я мобилизовал для отпора все силы, которые мог, потому мы еще живы. Сводные эскадры ополчения охотятся на нелюдей и охраняют конвои, а экспедиционные корпуса с лояльных миров давят мятежи еретиков. Ситуация нестабильна, но... Не буду лгать, что не готовился к этому кризису. Мы еще не проиграли".

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest headache. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia squadrons are hunting for inhumans and guarding convoys, and expeditionary corps from loyal worlds are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost yet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest headache. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia squadrons are hunting for inhumans and guarding convoys, and expeditionary corps from loyal worlds are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost yet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest headache. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia squadrons are hunting for inhumans and guarding convoys, and expeditionary corps from loyal worlds are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost yet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

traits.locale_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: “终末黎明教派与黑暗灵族袭击者正在互相竞争，想比一下谁能带来更多混乱。我已经调动了所有可以调动的力量，击退他们的进攻。也正是因为这个原因，我们依然还活着。许多民兵队联合起来追捕异形，守卫我们的运输通道。远征军分队也在我的指挥下，努力镇压异端分子的叛乱。目前的局势并不稳定……我并不打算谎称我对这场危机早有准备，不过，我们还没有输掉这场战争。”
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."

traits.locale_text: “终末黎明教派与黑暗灵族袭击者正在互相竞争，想比一下谁能让我们更头疼。我已经调动了所有可以调动的力量，击退他们的进攻。也正是因为这个原因，我们依然还活着。许多民兵队联合起来追捕异形，守卫我们的运输通道。来自忠诚世界的远征军，也在努力镇压异端分子的叛乱。目前的局势并不稳定……我并不打算谎称我对这场危机早有准备，不过，我们还没有输掉这场战争。”
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: «El Culto del Amanecer Final y los incursores Drukhari parecen estar compitiendo por ver quién nos causa más quebraderos de cabeza. He movilizado todas las fuerzas de las que dispongo para rechazar sus ataques y por eso seguimos vivos. Brigadas combinadas de la milicia dan caza a los xenos y protegen los convoyes, mientras que los pelotones bajo mi mando sofocan las revueltas herejes. La situación es inestable y... no voy a mentir y decir que estaba preparado para esta crisis, pero todavía no hemos perdido el control».
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."

traits.locale_text: «El Culto del Amanecer Final y los incursores Drukhari parecen estar compitiendo por ver quién nos causa más quebraderos de cabeza. He movilizado todas las fuerzas de las que dispongo para rechazar sus ataques y por eso seguimos vivos. Unidades combinadas de la milicia dan caza a los no humanos y protegen los convoyes, mientras que fuerzas expedicionarias de mundos leales sofocan las revueltas herejes. La situación es inestable y... no voy a mentir y decir que estaba preparado para esta crisis, pero todavía no hemos perdido».
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: 「最後の夜明け教団とデュカーリの襲撃者たちが、どちらがより酷い混乱を起こせるかと競い合っている。奴らの攻撃を撃退できる全戦力を集めた。だからこそ我々は今も生きていられているというわけだ。市民軍との混成旅団が異種族を狩るとともに部隊を護衛し、私の指揮下の遠征部隊は異端者の反乱を鎮圧している。戦況は不安定だが…この危機に備えていたと偽りを述べるつもりはない。しかし、まだ足元をすくわれたわけではない」
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."

traits.locale_text: 「最後の夜明け教団とデュカーリの襲撃者たちが、どちらがより酷い混乱を起こせるかと競い合っている。奴らの攻撃を撃退できる全戦力を集めた。だからこそ我々は今も生きていられているというわけだ。市民軍との混成旅団が異種族を狩るとともに部隊を護衛し、私の指揮下の遠征部隊は異端者の反乱を鎮圧している。戦況は不安定だが…この危機に備えていたと偽りを述べるつもりはない。しかし、まだ足元をすくわれたわけではない」
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: « Le Culte de l'Aube finale et les pillards drukharis rivalisent d'audace pour nous causer le plus d'ennuis possible. J'ai mobilisé toutes les forces à ma disposition pour repousser les attaques, grâce à quoi nous sommes encore debout. Des brigades combinées de miliciens traquent les xénos et protègent les convois, tandis que des pelotons expéditionnaires placés sous mon commandement écrasent les révoltes d'hérétiques. La situation est instable, mais... Je ne vais pas prétendre que j'étais prêt à affronter cette crise. Cela dit, rien n'est encore perdu. »
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."

traits.locale_text: « Le Culte de l'Aube finale et les pillards drukharis semblent essayer à qui mieux mieux de nous causer le plus d'ennuis possible. J'ai mobilisé toutes les forces à ma disposition pour repousser les attaques, grâce à quoi nous sommes encore debout. Des escouades combinées de miliciens traquent les non humains et protègent les convois, tandis que des corps expéditionnaires venus de mondes alliés écrasent les révoltes d'hérétiques. La situation est instable, mais... Je ne vais pas prétendre que j'étais prêt à affronter cette crise. Cela dit, nous ne sommes pas encore vaincus. »
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung und Drukhari-Räuber buhlen darum, wer uns am meisten Ärger machen kann. Ich habe alle möglichen Kräfte mobilisiert, um die Angriffe abzuwehren, und nur deshalb leben wir noch. Vereinte Militärbrigaden jagen Xenos und bewachen Konvois, und Expeditionskorps unter meinem Befehl schlagen Ketzeraufstände nieder. Die Situation ist instabil, aber ... Ich will nicht so tun, als wäre ich auf diese Krise vorbereitet gewesen. Aber noch haben wir unseren festen Stand nicht verloren."
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kult der letzten Dämmerung und Drukhari-Räuber buhlen darum, wer uns am meisten Kopfschmerzen machen kann. Ich habe alle möglichen Kräfte mobilisiert, um die Angriffe abzuwehren, und nur deshalb leben wir noch. Vereinte Militärschwadronen jagen Nicht-Menschen und bewachen Konvois, und Expeditionskorps von loyalen Welten schlagen Ketzeraufstände nieder. Die Situation ist instabil, aber ... Ich will nicht so tun, als wäre ich auf diese Krise vorbereitet gewesen. Aber noch haben wir nicht verloren."
traits.speaker: Inquisitor

languages.text: "Nihai Şafak Tarikatı ve Drukhari baskıncıları, bize zarar vermek için yarışıyor. Saldırıları savuşturmak için tüm kuvvetlerimizi devreye soktum. Şimdi hayatta olmamızın sebebi de bu. Birleşik milis tugayları, zenoları avlayıp konvoyları koruyor. Emrimdeki seferi müfrezelerse kâfir ayaklanmalarını bastırıyor. Vaziyet karışık ama... Bu krize hazırlıklı değildim, yalan olmasın. Fakat henüz hiçbir şey bitmiş değil."
languages.original_text: "The Cult of the Final Dawn and Drukhari raiders are vying with each other to see who can cause us the greatest turmoil. I have mobilised all the forces I can to repel the attacks, which is why we are still alive. Combined militia brigades are hunting for xenos and guarding convoys, and expeditionary platoons under my command are crushing heretic rebellions. The situation is unstable, but... I will not pretend that I was prepared for this crisis. However, we have not lost our footing yet."
